home_header_title: Become a developer, at your own pace.
home_header_title_vibe: Create your apps. Without becoming a dev. Without limits.
home_header_first_text: No generic path. We start from where you are to make you autonomous on any tech.
home_header_first_text_vibe: AI codes for you, but without the right foundations you stay limited. We give you the keys to vibe code without ceiling.
home_header_second_text: You'll learn to make the right technical choices and code without relying on tutorials.
home_header_second_text_vibe: Git, terminal, project structure, prompt engineering — just what you need so AI actually works for you.
home_social_proof_title: Djason unlocked his developer potential thanks to Seelearn.
home_social_proof_title_vibe: Djason vibe codes without limits thanks to the right foundations.
home_social_proof_first_text: +10 projects delivered on various technologies in just a few months.
home_social_proof_second_text: Able to learn a new technology in just a few days.
home_social_proof_second_text_vibe: Able to use any AI tool effectively.
home_social_proof_tertiary_text: Autonomous in a team or as a freelancer.
home_social_proof_tertiary_text_vibe: Knows when to vibe code and when to take back control.
page_description: Training to learn to code like a real developer. Master any technology and work autonomously.
contact_title: Want to know more? We're here to chat.
contact_description: Leave your details, we'll contact you quickly. No newsletter, just a conversation.
community_title: Join a community of devs who help each other.
community_description_1: With Seelearn, you're never alone. Personalized support, private livestreams to ask your questions, and a responsive community when you're stuck.
community_description_2: We motivate each other, share our wins, and find partners to launch projects together.
community_card_skool_text: The Seelearn community is here to support you, whatever your obstacle.
community_card_live_text: Regular live sessions to deepen your knowledge and ask your questions in real time.
community_card_tiktok_text: Find livestream excerpts, quick tips, and free previews of the training.
community_card_youtube_text: Access free excerpts from Seelearn and livestream replays.
faq_title: Got a question? Seekode is here!
faq_q1_title: Is this training suitable for complete beginners?
faq_q1_title_vibe: Can I vibe code without knowing how to code?
faq_q1_text:
Yes, absolutely. The training is designed to adapt to your level, whether you're starting from scratch or already have some basics.
No need to have attended an IT school or bootcamp before. We start where you are and move at your pace. The only prerequisite is motivation.
faq_q1_text_vibe:
Yes, and that's exactly why this training exists. AI works best when you know how to guide it — and that can be learned.

We give you the foundations that make the difference between a vibe coder stuck at 80% of their project and one who delivers complete apps. No need to have coded before. We start from zero, but we teach you what matters: essential tools, project structure, and the reflexes to make AI actually work for you.
faq_q2_title: How long does the training take?
faq_q2_title_vibe: How long before I can create my apps?
faq_q2_text:
It depends on you. It's a custom training, so there's no fixed duration. Some progress quickly because they have free time, others take several months alongside their job.
What matters is consistency. On average, expect a few months to gain real autonomy, but you'll progress from the very first weeks.
faq_q2_text_vibe:
Less time than a traditional dev training. You're not learning to become a developer — you're learning to pilot AI effectively.

In a few weeks, you can be operational and launch your first real projects. The pace depends on you, but the goal is clear: make you autonomous quickly, not have you spend months on theory.
faq_q3_title: Why pay when there are free resources everywhere?
faq_q3_title_vibe: Why pay when AI tools are free?
faq_q3_text:
Free resources have three real problems.
1. First, when you're stuck, you're alone — some people spend days on a bug with no one to help them.
2. Second, no one tells you what's truly essential: many self-taught developers discover Git years too late.
3. Finally, tutorials make you dependent: you learn to follow instructions, not to code by yourself.

With Seelearn, you have an instructor available to unblock you, a program designed custom from the first call, and exercises targeted at your weaknesses to become truly autonomous.
faq_q3_text_vibe:
The tools are free, but mistakes are expensive.

Without method, here's what happens: your project moves fast, then collapses at 80%. The code becomes unmaintainable. You introduce security flaws without knowing it. You waste hours asking AI for the impossible.

With Seelearn, you learn to avoid these pitfalls. We give you the structure, tools, and reflexes so your projects hold up — not just flimsy prototypes.
faq_q4_title: How can I be sure I'll finish?
faq_q4_text:
You're not left on your own with a program. You have a dedicated instructor who follows your progress, has regular check-ins with you, and gives you concrete feedback on your strengths and areas for improvement. They're there to push you when things slow down.

No useless or temporary exercises: every project is designed to facilitate your professional integration. From the start, you build a portfolio that you feed throughout the training. At the end, you have concrete achievements to show in interviews, with visible progression.
faq_q5_title: Will I be supported or left on my own?
faq_q5_text:
Quite the opposite. You have a dedicated instructor who follows your progress from start to finish. They have regular check-ins with you, answer your questions, and help you as soon as you're stuck. You're never alone facing a problem.

On top of that, you have access to an active community, livestreams to exchange in real time, and video content to go deeper. But the heart of the support is this direct relationship with your instructor.
faq_q6_title_vibe: Can I really create real apps with AI?
faq_q6_text:
Maybe. So what? There are plenty of reasons why AI will never replace a developer, and I'd be happy to discuss them with you. But honestly... it doesn't matter.

Let's imagine I'm wrong and AI really does replace us. You'll still need someone who knows how to code to verify that the AI did its job right — without security flaws or performance issues. Kind of like a site manager who supervises the workers.

Bottom line: even if it happens, we remain essential. And personally, getting paid to watch an AI work for me? I'm in.

Bonus: we also train you extensively on AI, so even if it happens, you'll be ready.
faq_q6_text_vibe:
Yes, but not just any way.

Without the right foundations, you'll make prototypes that impress in demos but collapse in production. The code will be fragile, hard to evolve, potentially full of security flaws.

With the right method, you create solid, maintainable, and secure apps. That's exactly what we teach you: not just to generate code, but to build projects that last.
faq_q7_title: Can I find a job after this training?
faq_q7_title_vibe: Can I launch my own project?
faq_q7_text:
Absolutely. Seelearn isn't just custom on the technical side — we define your goals together (employment, freelance, project creation) and support you to achieve them.

For example, if you're aiming for employment: every project will be visible online and added to your portfolio, we help you create content for social media, and community exercises on GitHub allow you to display regular activity.

Result: you show up to interviews with online projects, visible presence, and proof of constant activity. Trust me, less than 5% of devs make this effort — you'll already be ahead of the pack.
faq_q7_text_vibe:
That's exactly the goal. We don't train you to find a dev job — we train you to make your ideas real.

Side project, MVP, startup, internal tool... You leave with a working project, not just theoretical skills. And most importantly, you know how to evolve it, maintain it, and launch others.

You have the idea, we give you the means to make it happen.
faq_q8_text:
No, and that's by design. A degree requires a rigid program — incompatible with the custom approach we offer.

These are two different approaches: a certified training gives you academic proof. We build technical proof with you: online projects, GitHub activity, visible presence.

In the market, some companies rely solely on degrees. Others only look at what you can actually do. It's up to you to choose the approach that matches your goals.

What's certain: academic proof without technical proof rarely convinces — the opposite isn't true. And if you're aiming for freelance or creating your own project, the degree becomes irrelevant: you won't reject yourself in an interview.
faq_q9_text:
Custom means we adapt the path to you — not the other way around.

Concretely: we evaluate your level, your goals, and together we build the most efficient path. You don't waste time on what you already know, and you go deeper where you really need to.

It's the opposite of a fixed program where everyone follows the same course, at the same pace, with the same exercises. Here, every hour counts — and it's designed to make you progress, you.
review_1_content: Nicolas was my trainer at La Manu, and I learned a lot from him. Even outside of class hours, he took the time to explain and guide me. Thanks to his advice and support, I progressed very quickly and was able to successfully complete my career change as a web developer. Before that, I was a freelance editor/VFX artist, and his teaching really made a difference.
review_2_content: A complete training that doesn't just teach you to code, but to understand the code. Honestly, thank you so much, I really have everything I need to tackle any technology without worry! Thanks!
review_3_content: This training allowed me to successfully complete my career change. The content is clear and well-structured, and I gained confidence throughout the journey. I'm now comfortable with several technologies and able to quickly adapt to new tools and environments. Amazing! Go for it without hesitation!

privacy_data_collected_content:
We collect the following personal data only through the contact form:

• First and last name
• Email address
• Phone number

This data is voluntarily provided by the user when submitting the form.
privacy_purpose_content: Your data is collected to respond to your contact request. The legal basis for this processing is your consent (Article 6.1.a of the GDPR), given when submitting the form.
privacy_recipients_content:
Your data is intended only for:

• Nicolas Texier (data controller), who receives your information by email
• Google (Gmail), as a processor for email delivery
• Calendly, if you use the appointment booking service integrated into the website

No data is sold or transmitted to third parties for commercial purposes.
privacy_retention_content: Data collected through the contact form is retained for the time necessary to process your request, and deleted within a maximum of 12 months after the last exchange.
privacy_rights_content:
Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:

• Right of access: obtain a copy of your personal data
• Right to rectification: correct inaccurate data
• Right to erasure: request the deletion of your data
• Right to restriction: restrict the processing of your data
• Right to object: object to the processing of your data
• Right to portability: receive your data in a structured format

To exercise these rights, contact us at: nicolas@seekode.dev

In case of dispute, you may file a complaint with the CNIL (www.cnil.fr).
privacy_cookies_content: This website uses functional cookies. For more information, see our cookie management page.
privacy_third_party_content: This website integrates the Calendly service for appointment booking. When using this service, your data is subject to Calendly's privacy policy.
cookies_what_content: A cookie is a small text file stored on your device when visiting a website. It allows the site to remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.
cookies_used_content: This website only uses functional cookies strictly necessary for your browsing. They do not require your prior consent in accordance with current regulations.
cookies_local_storage_content: This site also uses your browser's local storage (localStorage) to remember the dismissal of the cookie information banner. This data stays on your device and is never transmitted to a server.
cookies_third_party_content: When using the Calendly appointment booking module, third-party cookies may be set by this service. These cookies are subject to Calendly's cookie policy. Calendly's consent banner is displayed when the module loads.
cookies_manage_content:
You can delete or block cookies at any time through your browser settings:

• Chrome: Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies
• Firefox: Settings → Privacy & Security → Cookies
• Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Cookies
• Edge: Settings → Cookies and site permissions

Deleting functional cookies may result in the loss of your preferences (theme, profile).
contact_consent: I agree that my data will be processed to respond to my request, in accordance with the privacy policy.
error_consent_required: You must accept the privacy policy
cookie_banner_text: This site uses functional cookies to remember your preferences (theme, profile). When booking an appointment, third-party cookies (Calendly) may be set.
